p: Currently, with the resumption of business and education, massive crowd, movements and hence contact, inevitably take place. Moreover, the number of imported backflow cases has also been growing, which objectively provides an opportunity for the novel coronavirus to spread. Therefore, although the confirmed cases of COVID-19 have declined, we should continue to maintain the intensity of scrutiny and investigation for potential cases, paying significant attention to the potential risk of clustering among various groups so as to prevent the domestic epidemiological trend from rising for the second time.
